                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         MessageFormattingException,
                                         MessageParsingException,
                                         UnrecognizedOptionException
        Receives a message.
        Parameters:
        in - The InputStream
        Returns:
        the received message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an io error occurred
        MessageFormattingException - Thrown of an error was found in the message formatting
        MessageParsingException - Thrown if an error occurred while parsing the message
        UnrecognizedOptionException - Thrown if an unrecognized option was found and the message must be rejected

                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               MessageFormattingException,
                               OptionFormattingException
        Send message.
        Parameters:
        out - The OutputStream
        message - the message to send
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an IO error occurred while sending.
        MessageFormattingException - Thrown if an error occurred while formatting the message
        OptionFormattingException - Thrown if an error occurred while formatting an option
